products.name: Luxury Palette Pillow Talk
products.description: Iconic eyeshadow quad in the dreamy Pillow Talk shade for a romantic, wide-awake look.
products.detailedDescription: The Charlotte Tilbury Luxury Palette in Pillow Talk features four harmonious shades — Prime, Enhance, Smoke, and Pop — designed to create a soft, sultry eye look. Ultra-blendable and long-wearing, perfect for day-to-night transitions.
products.ingredients: Talc, Mica, Silica, Dimethicone, Magnesium Myristate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride...
products.usageInstructions: Apply Prime all over the lid. Blend Enhance into the crease. Use Smoke to define the outer corner. Finish with Pop on the center for a glow.
benefits: Creamy, blendable texture with no fallout

products.name: Addict Lip Glow Button
products.description: Custom-color reviving balm that enhances your natural lip tone with a glossy finish.
products.detailedDescription: Dior Addict Lip Glow uses Color Reviver technology to react with your lips' pH for a unique pink shade. Provides 24-hour hydration and a subtle shine.
products.ingredients: Ricinus Communis Seed Oil, Beeswax, Shea Butter, Vitamin E, Mango Butter...
products.usageInstructions: Apply directly to lips as needed. Can be used alone or under lipstick.
benefits: Personalized pink tint for every user

products.name: Gucci Blush De Beauté
products.description: Silky blush that blends like cream and finishes like powder for a natural flush.
products.detailedDescription: Gucci Blush De Beauté is a multi-use powder that acts as blush, bronzer, and highlighter. Its melt-in texture delivers buildable color with a soft-focus glow.
products.ingredients: Talc, Mica, Silica, Nylon-12, Dimethicone, Magnesium Stearate...
products.usageInstructions: Swirl a brush over the powder and apply to the apples of the cheeks. Blend upward toward the temples.

products.name: Bloom Couture Eyes
products.description: Vibrant pink-themed eyeshadow palette designed for bold, inclusive looks.
products.detailedDescription: Fenty Beauty Bloom Couture Eyes features 10 high-pigment shades from soft pastels to electric pinks. Formulated for zero fallout and 12-hour wear.
products.ingredients: Talc, Mica, Zinc Stearate, Silica, Dimethicone...
products.usageInstructions: Use dry for soft color, wet brush for foiled effect. Layer for intensity.
benefits: Inclusive for all skin tones, especially deep

products.name: Pillow Talk Multi-Glow
products.description: Cream-powder highlighter that delivers a candlelit glow from within.
products.detailedDescription: Pillow Talk Multi-Glow is a hybrid highlighter with a soft-focus pearl finish. Use on cheekbones, brow bones, or lips for multidimensional radiance.
products.ingredients: Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Silica...
products.usageInstructions: Apply with fingertips or a small brush to high points of the face. Blend for a seamless glow.

products.name: Rouge Volupté Shine
products.description: Oil-in-stick lipstick that melts on lips for shine and comfort.
products.detailedDescription: YSL Rouge Volupté Shine combines vibrant color with 65% caring oils. Delivers a glossy, balm-like feel with medium coverage and fruity scent.
products.ingredients: Pomegranate Extract, Macadamia Oil, Jojoba Oil, Candelilla Wax...
products.usageInstructions: Apply directly from the bullet. Blot lightly for a stained effect or layer for full opacity.

products.name: Diorshow Mascara
products.description: Iconic volumizing mascara with XXL brush for panoramic lashes.
products.detailedDescription: Diorshow Mascara builds dramatic volume and length in one coat. Its oversized brush coats every lash for a false-lash effect without clumping.
products.ingredients: Aqua/Water, Paraffin, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Acrylates Copolymer...
products.usageInstructions: Wiggle brush from root to tip. Apply second coat for extra volume.

products.name: Orgasm Blush
products.description: Peachy-pink blush with golden sheen for a universal flush.
products.detailedDescription: NARS Orgasm Blush is a globally bestselling shade that flatters all skin tones. Finely milled powder blends seamlessly for a natural, radiant finish.
products.ingredients: Talc, Mica, Silica, Magnesium Myristate, Dimethicone...
products.usageInstructions: Smile and apply to the apples of the cheeks, blending upward toward the temples.

products.name: Forever Cushion
products.description: Long-wear cushion foundation with floral skincare benefits.
products.detailedDescription: Dior Forever Cushion delivers 24-hour flawless coverage with a luminous matte finish. Infused with pansy extract for hydration and pore refinement.
products.ingredients: Water, Dimethicone, Titanium Dioxide, Glycerin, Pansy Extract...
products.usageInstructions: Press puff into cushion and pat onto skin. Build for desired coverage.

products.name: Prisme Libre Powder
products.description: Four-color loose powder that perfects and mattifies with a soft glow.
products.detailedDescription: Givenchy Prisme Libre harmonizes four complementary shades to correct, illuminate, and set makeup. Ultra-fine texture blurs imperfections.
products.usageInstructions: Shake bottle, tap puff, and press lightly over face to set makeup.

products.name: Le Rouge Sheer Velvet
products.description: Sheer matte lipstick with a soft velvet blur finish.
products.detailedDescription: Le Rouge Sheer Velvet offers buildable sheer-to-medium coverage with a blurred, second-skin effect. Infused with hyaluronic acid for comfort.
products.ingredients: Dimethicone, Silica, Hyaluronic Acid, Mango Butter...
products.usageInstructions: Apply from the center of lips outward. Blot for a stained look.

products.name: Capture Totale Foundation
products.description: Anti-aging foundation with firming and radiance-boosting benefits.
products.detailedDescription: Dior Capture Totale Foundation combines full coverage with skincare actives from the Longoza flower. Visibly firms and illuminates in 4 weeks.
products.ingredients: Water, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Longoza Extract, Titanium Dioxide...
products.usageInstructions: Shake well. Apply with brush or sponge, blending from center outward.
